title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\RedactImageRequest\ImageRedactionConfig
name: ImageRedactionConfig
description:
Configuration for determining how redaction of images should occur.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.RedactImageRequest.ImageRedactionConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.info_type
params.description: Only one per info_type should be provided per request. If not specified, and redact_all_text is false, the DLP API will redact all text that it matches against all info_types that are found, but not specified in another ImageRedactionConfig.

params.name: data.redact_all_text
params.description: If true, all text found in the image, regardless whether it matches an info_type, is redacted. Only one should be provided.

params.name: data.redaction_color
params.description: The color to use when redacting content from an image. If not specified, the default is black.

methods.description:
Only one per info_type should be provided per request. If not specified, and redact_all_text is false, the DLP API will redact all text that it matches against all info_types that are found, but not specified in another ImageRedactionConfig.
